modName: DFGs Blade And Dagger Sheathe Sounds Mod
summary:
DFG\'s Blade & Dagger Sheathe Sounds Mod

What this mod does?
This mod changes the sheathe sounds of the 1h blades and the daggers to new sounds that I made recording a LOTR prop sword Sting going in and out of the scabbard and then enhancing the sound using Sony Vegas Pro and Audacity.

The mod also fixes the bug where some daggers would play
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ntsyC.jpg[/img]


[b]What this mod does?[/b]

This mod changes the sheathe sounds of the 1h blades and the daggers to new sounds that I made recording a LOTR prop sword Sting going in and out of the scabbard and then enhancing the sound using Sony Vegas Pro and Audacity.

The mod also fixes the bug where some daggers would play the 1handed blade sound and not the dagger sound.

[b]Why did you make this mod?[/b]

I never liked the sheathe sounds that came with the game and found them very loud when playing a stealth character.

[b]Promo Video Preview:[/b]

                                         
                                                [youtube]tP1nPdOCjNI[/youtube]



[b]Changelog:[/b]

V1.2 - 14/01/13 - Fixes The Rueful Axe sound and adds Dawnguard version. 
V1.1 - 06/03/12 - Adds sounds for the Katanas & Fixes a few sound bugs.
V1.0 - 29/02/12 - Mod Released on Steam Workshop.
V1.0 - 27/02/12 - Mod Released.

[b]Contact:[/b]

Send me a message here on Skyrim Nexus:
http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/807307-darkfiregaming/
Also you can find me here: 
http://www.youtube.com/user/DARKFIREGAMING

[b]Credits:[/b]

By Me/Darkfiregaming
Also thanks to gr8sfx for the base sound of the katana sounds that I then edited.
You Need Permission to use assets contained in my files.
author: Darkfiregaming
